thread.title: Balmain Celebrates Heavy Metal Music Legends With Its New Fall 2017 Collection
thread.title_full: Balmain Celebrates Heavy Metal Music Legends With Its New Fall 2017 Collection

author: Jesse Bernard
title: Balmain Celebrates Heavy Metal Music Legends With Its New Fall 2017 Collection
text:
Visit the original post to see all 12 images from this gallery. 
Location: Paris, France
The Vibe: Classic pieces but given some vibrancy through Oliver Rousteing’s abundance of grandeur. Overall totally over the top, then again just right for Balmain.
Key Pieces: There’s a lot of strong pieces in this season’s collection but the camo pieces are sure to be a hit. The beaded pieces remind us of Haute Couture scale detailing and the collection is filled with strong leather outerwear.
